_description: A miracle of the Virgin Mary: the Knight and his jealous wife

BodAsh61.First Lines:
Lorgynges curtase & henelystyns how þis tale schall
                    endeT[hat] I wyll ȝow seyneAnd if ge wyll with gode wyll
                    here…
BodAsh61.Last Lines: …Dorste no lenger A bydeBot fled A wey full sore
BodAsh61.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 329-33.
Boyd,  Beverly May,
                        ed.  
             Middle English Miracles of the Virgin.
         New York: Columbia UP, 1955; San Marino, CA: Huntington Library,
            1964: 92-104.
Shuffleton,  George. 
             Ashmole 61: A Compilation of Popular Middle English Verse.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008: 170-80; 484-8; 608.
